function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase of displayed COVID-19 guidelines, warnings, and obligations in stores","Impact":"Negative impact on customer experience, possible psychological reactance, and lower perceived control","Mitigation":"Integrate digital displays showing humorous safety guidelines, use context-aware in-store advertising, and ensure relevance of displayed messages","Technologies":"Digital signage, location-tracking technology, in-store beacons, holograms","People":"Customers, retailers","Owner":"Retailers"},{"Description":"Ambient conditions of physical servicescape, including background music and noise levels","Impact":"Potential spread of virus due to loud conversations in restaurants and bars","Mitigation":"Advise to lower volume in restaurant settings, regulate ambient conditions to prevent virus spread","Technologies":"NA","People":"Customers, restaurant/bar owners","Owner":"Restaurant/bar owners"}]}
